rows.label: tlk70000031_05_msg0001
rows.name:
Look, I know getting revenge
isn't gonna solve nothing.

rows.label: tlk70000031_05_msg0002
rows.name:
I spent a year hunting this
guy down only to find him a
shadow of his former self.

rows.label: tlk70000031_05_msg0003
rows.name:
Took the wind right out of my sails.
I can't exactly kill him now, can I?
That'd be a lousy thing to do.

rows.label: tlk70000031_05_msg0004
rows.name:
But I need somewhere to direct all
this pent-up frustration, else it's
gonna bust right out my chest!

rows.label: tlk70000031_05_msg0005
rows.name:
I'll start by making sure
this sad excuse for a man
turns his bloody life around.

rows.label: tlk70000031_05_msg0006
rows.name:
All this self-flagellation and
meaningless sacrifice business
pisses me right off. Miserable turd!

rows.label: tlk70000031_05_msg0007
rows.name:
Stop eating shitty food and feeling sorry
fer yourself! A healthy spirit can only
live in a healthy body 'n all that!

rows.label: tlk70000031_05_msg0008
rows.name:
If my sister were alive today, that's
what she'd want. Neither of us
suffers fools, I tell ya what...
